mapper.select: SELECT b.id AS 'logId', b.mobile AS 'mobile', b.memberType AS 'memberType', b.rechargeAmonut AS 'rechargeAmonut', b.createTime AS 'startTime' FROM `t_risk_member_log` a INNER JOIN`t_risk_member_log` b ON a.memberRechargeId=b.id WHERE a.riskDealcode=#{dealcode} limit 1;
SELECT count(*) AS 'numberOfTime' FROM ( SELECT memberRechargeId FROM `t_risk_member_log` GROUP BY riskDealcode ) t WHERE t.memberRechargeId = #{logId};
